vote.title: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with Estrada Concrete Company, LLC for the construction of bicycle and pedestrian facilities on Stevens Forest Drive from Stevens Village Drive to Mary Cliff Road and Mary Cliff Road from Taft Street to Ranier Street - Not to exceed $838,534.75, from $94,127,183.50 to $94,965,718.25 - Financing: Davis Garden TIF District Fund
